about_the_game:
Roll Camera: Julius Brown's Adventure Begins!


All Fridges are Psychotic is the triumphant first adventure of Julius Brown in his film-making career.

Julius is desperately searching for his big break, and he's set his sights on a golden opportunity - the Californian Film-maker of the Year competition, where budding screenwriters submit their scripts to be judged by a famous Director.

Entering isn't as straightforward as expected, and Julius needs all his wits about him to overcome puzzles, time travel, and weak coding to complete his quest.

Point and Click Nostalagia

The game draws inspiration from the love of classic adventure games - Monkey Island, Day of the Tentacle and other golden point-and-click games of the past.

Created in Scotland by Flag Hippo

Designed and Written by the Indie gaming outfit Flag Hippo, with fantastic artwork by Manda Rin of Bis.
